detectors.description:
FiatTokenV1.initialize(string,string,string,uint8,address,address,address,address)._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FiatTokenV1.sol#430) shadows:
	- Ownable._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FiatTokenV1.sol#51) (state variable)

FiatTokenV1.allowance(address,address).owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FiatTokenV1.sol#507) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FiatTokenV1.sol#71-73) (function)

Blacklistable.notBlacklisted(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FiatTokenV1.sol#152-155) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool)(blacklisted[_account] == false) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FiatTokenV1.sol#153)

FiatTokenV1.onlyMinters() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FiatTokenV1.sol#452-455) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool)(minters[msg.sender] == true) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FiatTokenV1.sol#453)
Pragma version^0.4.24 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FiatTokenV1.sol#13) allows old versions
Pragma version^0.4.24 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FiatTokenV1.sol#38) allows old versions
